title: Metro.2033.Redux-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                                                                        
                               Metro 2033 REDUX 

    Release Date :  8/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : FPS 

    

    With re-worked next-gen visuals, smooth 60FPS gameplay on pc, as well
    as new and improved content and features, METRO REDUX is much more
    than a simple HD upgrade. 

   
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
   - Play 

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
